Installation¶

At the command line:

pip install igem-wikisync

Known Issues¶

SSL error:

  • Check pyopenssl installation with –force-reinstall

  • Install python3.6 using deadsnakes ppa

  • Check location of installed pyopenssl without --force-reinstall and ensure that the location is present in $PATH
